pageContent: Objectives: We compared the cancer detection rate of extended 14-core biopsy with that of sextant biopsy to assess whether additional biopsy cores are useful for detection of prostate cancer and to clarify the indications for obtaining additional cores.

metaData.source:
The value of contrast-enhanced transrectal ultrasound in predicting the nature of prostate diseases and the Gleason score of prostate cancer by a subjective blood flow grading scale
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/21832814/
